projects.title: BookApp
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that shows the details of books belonging to many fields.
 - Option to search the book desired.
 - Option open the book on the browser.
 - Uses **SQLite** database to store all data.

projects.title: Stock Management Web App
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App that alows the stock management.
 - The person in charge can easily knows the quantity left of each product.
 - Alert option in case the quantity of a product is less than a specific number.
- Uses **mySQL** database to store all data.

projects.title: Interns Management Web App
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App that alows the head of the service to manage the interns.
 - Each person in charge of a group of interns can acces to this web site and manage them.
 - Uses **mySQL** database to store all data.

projects.title: Students Marks Management App
projects.bodyText:
- A Desktop App that alows the teachers to manage the marks of students.
 - Option of schedule for teachers.
- Uses **mySQL** database to store all data.
